entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
